rukus.text: 18|1|Yabatiya prasansa allahara'i yini tamra bandara upara kitaba nayila karechena [1] ebam tate tini bakrata rakhenani [2]
18|2|saralarupe [1], tamra kathina sasti samparke satarka karara jan'ya ebam muminagana yara satkaja kare, taderake e susambada deyara jan'ya ye, tadera jan'ya ache uttama puraskara
18|4|ara satarka karara jan'ya taderake yara bale, allah santana grahana karechena [1]
18|5|e bisaye tadera kono jnana ne'i ebam tadera pitrpurusadera'o chila na. Tadera mukha theke bera ha'oya bakya ki sanghatika! Tara to sudhu mithya'i bale [1].
18|6|Tara e banite imana na anale sambhabata tadera pichane ghure apani duhkhe atma-binasi haye parabena [1].
18|7|Niscaya yaminera upara ya kichu ache amara seguloke tara sobha karechi [1], manusake e pariksa karara jan'ya ye, tadera madhye kaje ke srestha.
18|8|Ara tara upara ya kichu ache ta abasya'i amara udbhidasun'ya mayadane parinata karaba [1].
18|9|Apani ki mane karena ye, kahapha [1] o rakimera [2] adhibasira amadera nidarsanabalira madhye bismayakara [3]

18|10|yakhana yubakara guhaya asraya nila takhana tara balechila, â€˜he amadera raba! Apani nija theke amaderake anugraha dana karuna ebam amadera jan'ya amadera kajakarma sathikabhabe paricalanara byabastha karuna [1].
18|11|Atahpara amara taderake guhaya kayeka bachara ghumanta abasthaya rakhalama [1]
18|12|pare amara taderake jagiye dilama janara jan'ya ye, duâ€™dalera madhye konati? [1] Tadera abasthitikala sathikabhabe nirnaya karate pare.
